definition: Ba state during Zhou dynasty (in east of modern Sichuan)/abbr. for east Sichuan or Chongqing/surname Ba/abbr. for Palestine or Palestinian/abbr. for Pakistan

to long for/to wish/to cling to/to stick to/sth that sticks/close to/next to/spread open/informal abbr. for bus 巴士[ba1 shi4]/bar (unit of pressure)/nominalizing suffix on certain nouns, such as 尾巴[wei3 ba5], tail
abbr. for Hubei Province 湖北省[Hu2 bei3 Sheng3] in central China/surname E

sentences.english: What is Bilbao going to show in the Expo?
sentences.chinese: 畢爾巴鄂將在世博會上展示什麼？

sentences.english: Will we see Pato in action in Friday's friendly against Athletic Bilbao?
sentences.chinese: 我們將在週五對畢爾巴鄂競技的友誼賽中看見帕託？

sentences.english: Gran Hotel Domine Bilbao boasts several relaxing areas for guest to unwind.
sentences.chinese: 畢爾巴鄂附近的飯店有幾個客人放鬆休閒的場所。
